intro: Fugosia cuneata, commonly known as the narrow-leafed fumitory, is a flowering plant belonging to the Papaveraceae family. Its flowers are pollinated by insects, and it produces capsule fruits containing several seeds. Fugosia cuneata is often found in meadows and along roadsides, where it thrives in full sun.
